item.description:
Imagine identifying plants in the field with your iPad or smartphone! Go Botany is the new definitive on-line Flora of New England for just that. Elizabeth Farnsworth will introduce and demonstrate this richly illustrated interactive key to over 3,500 native and naturalized plants of our region. This tool also includes PlantShare for reporting discoveries, exchanging checklists, and more. This evening will equip you to ID and better understand the many plants you encounter. Dr. Farnsworth is the Senior Research Ecologist for the New England Wild Flower Society, a superb teacher, and Editor-in-Chief of "Rhodora."

More information at: http://www.grownativemass.org/programs/eveningswithexperts
item.name: Go Botany! Plant ID for the 21st Century
